long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the best deals at Superstore. With a couple clicks, automatically select the sale items and sort them by the discount percentage. Save time clicking through each page by allowing the extension to load multiple pages automatically. 
The extension also calculates the net cost of each item, taking into account the PC Optimum points earned as well as sale price and limit price.

2.2 update:
- Fixing limit deals not showing up

2.1 update:
- Major update to bring the extension up to date with the site updates

2.0 update:
- Major update to the core architecture of the extension. Nothing visible to the user

1.22 update:
- Fixed bug where wrong config was being used

1.21 update:
- Fixed bug to deal with NaN numbers

1.20 update:
- Fixed bug where next pages would not load if the screen size was too small

1.19 update:
- Improved the Load Deals menu so that various categories could be linked to quickly and having it show up on the main page

1.18 update:
- fixed multi page loading
